ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ حمٓ
ayahs.translation: Ha, Meem.

ayahs.text: وَٱلْكِتَٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
ayahs.translation: By the clear Book,

ayahs.text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍۢ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].

ayahs.text: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -

ayahs.text: أَمْرًۭا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
ayahs.translation: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]

ayahs.text: رَحْمَةًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayahs.translation: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

ayahs.text: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.

ayahs.text: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.translation: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.

ayahs.text: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ يَلْعَبُونَ
ayahs.translation: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.

ayahs.text: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.

ayahs.text: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Covering the people; this is a painful torment.

ayahs.text: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."

ayahs.text: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌۭ مَّجْنُونٌ
ayahs.translation: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."

ayahs.text: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
ayahs.translation: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.

ayahs.text: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌۭ كَرِيمٌ
ayahs.translation: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,

ayahs.text: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"

ayahs.text: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.

ayahs.text: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.

ayahs.text: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
ayahs.translation: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."

ayahs.text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌۭ مُّجْرِمُونَ
ayahs.translation: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.

ayahs.text: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
ayahs.translation: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.

ayahs.text: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌۭ مُّغْرَقُونَ
ayahs.translation: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."

ayahs.text: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

ayahs.text: وَزُرُوعٍۢ وَمَقَامٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And crops and noble sites

ayahs.text: وَنَعْمَةٍۢ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَٰكِهِينَ
ayahs.translation: And comfort wherein they were amused.

ayahs.text: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayahs.translation: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.

ayahs.text: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
ayahs.translation: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
ayahs.translation: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -

ayahs.text: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayahs.translation: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.

ayahs.text: وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٌۭا۟ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.translation: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,

ayahs.text: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
ayahs.translation: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

ayahs.text: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

ayahs.text: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍۢ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.

ayahs.text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.

ayahs.text: مَا خَلَقْنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًۭى شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -

ayahs.text: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.translation: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum

ayahs.text: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
ayahs.translation: Is food for the sinful.

ayahs.text: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
ayahs.translation: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

ayahs.text: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
ayahs.translation: Like the boiling of scalding water.

ayahs.text: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
ayahs.translation: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."

ayahs.text: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
ayahs.translation: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place;

ayahs.text: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Within gardens and springs,

ayahs.text: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍۢ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍۢ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
ayahs.translation: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.

ayahs.text: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

ayahs.text: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.

ayahs.text: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

ayahs.text: فَضْلًۭا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayahs.translation: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded.

ayahs.text: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
ayahs.translation: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].
